_README: Copy this file to 'preferences.json' and customize the values for your setup.
• paths.input_loc: Directory where your data are stored
Used by the matlab batch script
• paths.output_loc: Directory where performance summary PNG files will be saved
The application creates subdirectories here for each subject
• paths.remote: rclone remote path for Google Drive backup
• subjects: List of lab subject IDs to process
Replace with your actual subject identifiers
